short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encode plain text to Base64 text. Decode Base64 text to plain text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Encode plain text to Base64 text and copy the result to clipboard. Decode Base64 text to plain text and copy the result to clipboard. 

How:
1. Select the text you would like to encode or decode.
2. Right-Click and select "Base64 encode/decode ...".
3. Done. You will get the result in your clipboard.
